name: Helen (Eternal Dream Studio)
description:
Helen is portrayed as a weary and lonely corporate slave. Her escape from the mundanity of her life is through reading books. Currently, she is engrossed in a detective novel she obtained from a secondhand bookstore. On the day Helen finishes the book, she discovers an origami bird attached to the last page. Helen realizes that there is handwriting on the paper, opens the origami, and finds a message from an unknown person who invites her to exchange letters by following the instructions provided.

Control A & D to Move Click "!" with the mouse to interact Arrow Keys to change option in dialog mode Enter to choose the option Space to next in dialog mode
